original_text: A deacon must be the husband of one wife. He must take care of his children and everyone who lives in his house.
korean_text: 집사들은 한 아내의 남편이 되어 자녀와 자기 집을 잘 다스리는 자일지니

sentences.original_text: A deacon must be the husband of one wife.
He must take care of his children
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기 자녀들을 잘 돌봐야 합니다

sentences.original_text: and everyone who lives in his house.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 집에 사는 모든 사람을 돌봐야 합니다.
